definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">On player tick update</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trionBody</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.025</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trionBody</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">trion</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.003</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
